text:
ITM TwentyFirst | Data Analyst | Minneapolis, MN | ONSITE | https://www.itm21st.com

We are seeking a skilled data analyst to apply statistical principles and practices in collaboration with our data science team across our growing, data-driven company. You will play a critical role in the company, help develop new data products, and use data to inform strategic business decisions. You will help shape the future of data at our company.

ITM TwentyFirst is a growing and quick-paced work environment in the life insurance settlement market. We serve professional trustees (including banks and trust companies, law firms and CPAs), wealth advisors and family offices, universities and foundations, and life settlement investors.

We are a small but growing team of data professionals. If your interested, please email me at <my username>@itm21st.com.
